Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[telegram] <Acura360> Forwarded from Acura360: We have released new version of Agama 0.3.6. The updated version has a lot of changes and an improved UI to make it more user friendly. This version changes how you create new wallet in Lite or Native mode and the way you use Lite mode vs Native mode.
Direct login using seed or WIF key is no longer supported. You will need to use restore wallet feature first with existing seed or WIF.
Concurrent usage of native and lite mode coins is deprecated. From now on you can either run Lite mode coins or Native mode coins during one session.
Your coins selection is automatically stored when you add or remove coins.
Native mode coins can be started without creating an Agama wallet. Just add them using the login screen.
Following security best practices you must write down your seed in a safe place while creating a new account. Do NOT take screenshot or picture of your seed on a machine that is connected to internet.
We have updated guides on how to use the new lite mode https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000024492-create-new-wallet-and-encrypt-seed-spv-
How to restore wallet with new Lite mode using seed/WIF https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000026360-use-private-key-wif-or-seed-phrase-to-login-into-agama-lite-mode
Please find all Agama Desktop related guides here https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/29000034534
If you have further questions please search the solutions page to find answers first before asking for help. In case you still need help, please visit #support-wallet channel where community and team members are constantly helping users in need. Alternatively, you can create a support ticket. A link to support help desk is available within Agama, just click on 3 lines (menu icon) on the top-right corner or Agama and select Support.
New Agama v0.3.6 download: https://komodoplatform.com/komodo-wallets/

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[telegram] <Acura360> Forwarded from Acura360: Changelog:
- Latest KMD binaries based on beta branch
- Create wallet refactor
- Restore wallet
- Add coin modal Lite mode KMD assets toggle
- Add coin modal ERC20 tokens are accessible now under a new mode option
- PIN login refactor
- Added User Agreement
- Store active coins list in PIN file
- HUSH switched to HUSH3 asset chain using SPV/Lite mode
- OUR native mode wallet -ac_perc param fix
- K64 logo change
- ILN name fix and logo change
- SPV transaction history caching fix
- Removed GBX
- Import key modal multi rescan fix
- Address book z-address fix
The voting UI hasn't changed, and you can continue voting with this version. Just make sure that you have created a new wallet with fresh 24 words seed or restored wallet with existing seed or WIF.
